item.title: Transitioning from Android to iOS â€” The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
item.description: This year I have switched from an Android smartphone (Samsung Galaxy J3 (2016)) to an iPhone (SE 2020). When switching, these things stood out to me: There is no really usable calendar app. I was using Business Calendar before and I still miss the month widget. I have settled with Google Calendar for now. The swipe gestures from all possible sides of the screen instead of the 1-dimensional top drawer menu are really interesting, and I have grown very fond of them.
